title: Carpesabrolide A, a novel meroterpenoid with anti-inflammatory activity from Carpesium abrotanoides
content:
RSC Adv., 2024, 14,11002-11006
DOI: 10.1039/D4RA00292J, Paper
Open Access
  This article is licensed under a Creative Commons Attribution 3.0 Unported Licence.
Xiao-Fang Zhang, Jiao-Xian Du, Si-Qiong Teng, Hui Liu, Juan He, Tao Feng, Ji-Kai Liu
Carpesabrolide A is a fumaric acid–guaiane sesquiterpenoid hybrid isolated from the medicinal plant Carpesium abrotanoides. It significantly inhibited NO production with an IC50 value of 2.7 μM.
